    "my string",
    1,
    2,
    3,
    {
        "important" : [ [1,2], ["one", "two"] ],
        "blah" : { 1: "one", 2: "two"}
    }
]

import pickle
with open("mypicklefile.bin", "wb") as f:
    pickle.dump(big_giant_data, file=f)

del big_giant_data
